name: fudr
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebookincubator/create-react-app).

scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm build" "cd server && npm build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules npm.lock" "cd client && rimraf node_modules build npm.lock" "cd server && rimraf node_modules build npm.lock"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"

author: Jeff
